title: Order #
confirming_1: The manager will check the order from 15 to 45 minutes, from 10AM to 8PM.
confirming_2: After confirming the order, a button for payment will appear.

order.title: Address
order.about_delivery: A manager will contact you to clarify information about the delivery and further registration of the order.

buy.title: Your order is unpaid
buy.paragraph_1: To pay for your order, go to the payment page using the button below
